com.iver.cit.gvsig.drivers.dwg
Class DwgMemoryDriver

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.MemoryDriver
      com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.AbstractCadMemoryDriver
          com.iver.cit.gvsig.drivers.dwg.DwgMemoryDriver
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.hardcode.driverManager.Driver, com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.driver.GDBMSDriver, com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.driver.ObjectDriver, com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.driver.ReadAccess, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.BoundedShapes, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.VectorialDriver, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.VectorialFileDriver, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.WithDefaultLegend
public class DwgMemoryDriver
extends com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.AbstractCadMemoryDriver
implements com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.VectorialFileDriver, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.WithDefaultLegend

Driver that allows gvSIG to read files in DWG format Using this driver, a gvSIG user can manipulate part of the information contained in a DWG file This driver load the Dwg file in memory This driver uses jdwglib

Author:
jmorell

Parameters:

initialize

public void initialize()
                throws com.hardcode.gdbms.driver.exceptions.ReadDriverException
This method load the DWG file in memory. First, it will be necessary to create a DwgFile object with the DWG file path as the argument. Second, the method read of DwgFile allows to read the objects inside the DWG file. Third, it will be necessary to process some DWG objects like Layers or Polylines Fourth, applyExtrusions() can change the location of the DWG objects through the extrusion parameters. Fifth, the testDwg3D method test if this DWG has elevation informacion. Sixth, we can extract the objects contained inside the blocks through the blockManagement method. And finally, we can read the objects Vector, and convert this objects to the FMap object model.

Specified by:
initialize in interface com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.VectorialFileDriver
Throws:
com.hardcode.gdbms.driver.exceptions.ReadDriverException
